thread.title: Ferrer Surges to Vienna Title
thread.title_full: Ferrer Surges to Vienna Title - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Ferrer Surges to Vienna Title
text:
Eighth-ranked David Ferrer won his 26th career title, rallying to defeat Steve Johnson, 4-6, 6-4, 7-5, at the Erste Bank Open in Vienna.
■ Marin Cilic retained his title at the Kremlin Cup in Moscow, beating Roberto Bautista Agut, 6-4, 6-4, in a repeat of last year’s final. (AP)
■ Top-seeded Tomas Berdych won the Stockholm Open for the third time, beating Jack Sock, 7-6 (1), 6-2. (AP)
